Title: Establishes the consumer credit rights and responsibilities outreach program
Summary: Establishes the consumer credit rights and responsibilities outreach program to educate the public about the rights and obligations of citizens of the state of New York with regard to credit services and reporting; requires an annual report concerning the operation of such program.
LawCode: Add Art 7 ยง701, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to a public education program about the rights of consumers
